meanings: [명사] negotiation, talks; (임금·가격 등의) bargaining, [동사] negotiate (with); (임금·가격 등을) bargain (with)

vlive.korean: 다음번엔 꼭 협상해서 올게요. I will try to do that next time. 듣기 View video ITZY : [ #류진 ] WAWE🙈
vlive.english: I will try to do that next time.

vlive.korean: 안돼요, 아직 유나랑 협상을 못 봤어. No! I didn't make a deal with her yet. 듣기 View video ITZY : [ #류진 ] WAWE🙈
vlive.english: No! I didn't make a deal with her yet.

vlive.korean: [협상][제안] 저기 뭐야, 히트곡 말고 다른 걸로 한번 해볼 수 있나요? [Negotiating] Can we try another category? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
[협상 제안] PD님 이것도 약간 5명 중 한 명이라도 선택... [Starts negotiation] Producer, maybe one out of five... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.8
vlive.english: [Starts negotiation] Producer, maybe one out of five...

vlive.korean: [협상 시도] - 그래 - 한 중간? [Try to negotiate] - Oh. - Maybe we should go just halfway? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “용띠즈의 드림 그래프 ” (재민·제노 : NCT DREAM)
vlive.english: [Try to negotiate] - Oh. - Maybe we should go just halfway?

examples.korean: the long, tortuous process of negotiating peace 발음듣기 길고 우여곡절이 많은 평화 협상 과정 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the long, tortuous process of negotiating peace 발음

examples.korean: The government will not negotiate with terrorists. 발음듣기 정부는 테러범들과는 협상하지 않을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government will not negotiate with terrorists. 발음

examples.korean: Attempts to negotiate peace ended in armed revolt. 발음듣기 평화 협상 시도는 무장 반란으로 끝이 났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Attempts to negotiate peace ended in armed revolt. 발음

examples.korean: After much hard bargaining we reached an agreement. 발음듣기 많은 힘든 협상 끝에 우리는 합의에 이르렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: After much hard bargaining we reached an agreement. 발음

examples.korean: The group rejects outright any negotiations with the government. 발음듣기 그 단체는 정부와의 어떠한 협상도 전면 거부하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The group rejects outright any negotiations with the government. 발음
